en-US.treatment-a-screen-1-title: Add this site to your bookmarks toolbar?
en-US.treatment-a-screen-1-subtitle: Your bookmark will be saved just below the address bar for quick access.
en-US.treatment-a-screen-2-accept-subtitle: You can drag and drop tabs here to keep more of your favorite sites within reach.
en-US.treatment-a-screen-2-decline-subtitle: You can add other sites you visit more often. Simply drag and drop tabs here to keep favorite websites within reach.
en-US.treatment-b-subtitle: Once open, you can drag and drop tabs onto the bookmarks toolbar to keep your favorite sites within reach.
en-US.treatment-c-title: Add this site to your bookmarks toolbar?
en-US.treatment-c-subtitle: We’ll leave the toolbar open so you can drag tabs here and keep your favorite sites within reach.
